explanation: [0-0] A man with a beard, wearing a blue headscarf and a brown vest, is sleeping leaning against a wall. Beside him lies a bundle of colorful long and round balloons. A boy in blue pants and a brown jacket walks towards him.
[0-2] Then the boy approaches the man and reaches out his right hand to touch a red round balloon, which immediately explodes.
[0-2] Then the boy approaches the man and reaches out his right hand to touch a red round balloon, which immediately explodes.

[2-6] The man is startled, falls to the ground, and accidentally swats a green round balloon with his left hand, sending it flying. The other balloons scatter around him. The boy is also frightened and backs up a few steps. The man sits on the ground, clutching his chest with both hands, mouth agape, and looks at the scattered balloons in confusion.
